My personal open-source passion projects

AI coding assistant that maintains deep understanding of your entire codebase and automates the boring parts of testing, debugging, and third party integrations built exclusively for the web stack.

Air Quality Impact & Visualizations

Real-time air quality impact calculator that transforms complex AQI metrics into immediately understandable health consequences. Visualizes permanent health damage, debunk pollution immunity myths, and drives awareness through shareable health insights
